relationship_id.description: User Guidance: The relationship between CONCEPT_ID_1 and CONCEPT_ID_2. Please see the [Vocabulary Conventions](https://ohdsi.github.io/CommonDataModel/dataModelConventions.html#concept_relationships). for more information.

valid_start_date.description: User Guidance: The date when the relationship is first recorded.

valid_end_date.description: User Guidance: The date when the relationship is invalidated.

invalid_reason.description: User Guidance: Reason the relationship was invalidated. Possible values are 'D' (deleted), 'U' (updated) or NULL.
